|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5416; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2133; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA, U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|TRENDnet TEW-631BRP V2.0R|U-MEDIA}}
* Specs are per the submitted FCC internal photos. 4MB Flash and 8MB RAM seems weird for this device, however. Additionally, there are multiple revisions of this device. V2.0R and V3.0R seem to use the same firmware, but V1.0R does not. This information may not be 100% accurate.
The device is shown as having two integral (L+R) and one removable (M) antenna in one submission and 3 RP-SMA connectors in another. The last submission also shows the device with a [[Ubicom]] IP5160U rather than the IP3023 of the earlier ones (V1.0R).
==See also== *[[TRENDnet TEW-611BRP]] *[[TRENDnet TEW-633GR]] *[[SMC SMCWGBR14-N]] *[[ZyXEL NBG-415N]] *[[ZyXEL X-550]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
